thread.title: Elizabeth Pocsik
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Elizabeth Pocsik

author: Elizabeth Pocsik
title: Elizabeth Pocsik
text: Every aspect of your trip was planned and executed perfectly by our travel consultant Caitlyn Rowlands. We stayed at 2 wonderful hates - Los Altos in Manuel Antonio and The Springs near La Fortuna, and we did a lot of amazing activities - zip lining, waterfall rappelling, tubing, whitewater rafting. All of our excursions and transfers were planned by CR Vacations, and everything worked perfectly. I have recommended them to multiple people who are planning trips to Costa Rica.
